attributes.title: Is there a God? Yes, surely God Exists, but Not as We Define...
attributes.description:
"Surely there is a higher intelligence which generates, operates, destroys, deludes, liberates," Nithyananda begins His beautiful answer to the question of whether or not God exists. 

This video features a segment of the Ask the Avatar interview that aired live on 4 March, 2017, between TV Mohandas Pai and Nithyananda. In this clip, Nithyananda explains why there are conflicts between world religions. This clear and simple statement sheds light instantly on so-called "Holy Wars" and religious tensions around the world.

See the full interview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bpWPJj8QADI
